entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
